author: Special Correspondent
text:
Heels on Wheels — an all-women four-wheel treasure hunt — will be conducted on March 13 (Sunday) as part of the 6th edition of International Women’s Day celebrations organised by VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science in association with The Hindu . The event is powered by PSR Silk Sarees, Coimbatore.

The treasure hunt will commence from The Hindu press, 391/1 and 391/2 part, Kamarajar Road in Singanallur – next to Hotel Aloft. This will be the last of the three part celebrations.

The first event was the panel discussion on gender parity held on March 8 followed by a cookery contest on March 9.

Prize distribution for the treasure hunt as well as the cookery contest will be held at Fun Republic Mall on Sunday evening. Interested persons for ‘Heels on Wheels’ contest can register their names. For registration contact: 99943 36721, 0422 – 2446721. Spot registrations will be held between 7 a.m. and 8 a.m. Limited entries only. The event is presented by VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science and powered by PSR Silk Sarees. Associate partner Twin Birds, Tirupur; automobile partner Renault; hospitality Partner Sree Annaporna Sree Gowrisankar; logistics partner Coimbatore Auto Sports Club; experience partner Trio Event Managers; mall partner Fun Republic, and gift partner Sakthi Gold and Banaanaa Slice.
title: Heels on Wheels on Sunday
